pkgmetadata.longdescription: # b2gperfb2gperf is a tool for testing the performance of[Firefox OS](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Mozilla/Firefox_OS).## PrerequisitesYou will need a[Marionette enabled Firefox build](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Marionette/Builds)that you can[successfully connect to](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Marionette/Connecting_to_B2G).## InstallationInstallation is simple: pip install b2gperfIf you anticipate modifying b2gperf, you can instead: git clone git://github.com/mozilla/b2gperf.git cd b2gperf python setup.py develop## Running Usage: b2gperf [options] app_name [app_name] ... For full usage details run `b2gperf --help`.## Test VariablesCurrently the only test variable support is for a wifi network. If you want toconnect to wifi before measuring performance, please specify a path to a JSONfile that describes the network. For example: { "wifi": { "ssid": "MyNetwork", "keyManagement": "WPA-PSK", "psk": "SecurePassword" } }
